Voted Best Sports Bar, Wings, and Burgers 8 Years in a row!
Patches Pub & Grill
4723 Thomas Dr, Panama City Beach, FL 32408
Open Daily 11am to Midnight
(850) 233-8879

Patches Pub
Welcome to Patches Pub & Grill
– where locals hang out, and visitors feel right at home! Located on the east end of Panama City Beach at 4723 Thomas Drive, we’re proud to be your go-to neighborhood spot for cold drinks, great food, and live entertainment.
At Patches, we serve up a hearty mix of American pub classics – think award-winning burgers, handmade pizzas, and fresh Gulf seafood. Some fan favorites include our house-smoked tuna dip, buffalo chicken nachos, and the Patches Panama Philly. And don’t skip dessert – our Oreo peanut butter pie is legendary.
We offer both indoor and outdoor seating, with a laid-back, beachy vibe that reflects the spirit of the Gulf Coast. Our outdoor patio is pet-friendly too, so bring your furry friends – we’ll have water bowls waiting!
With 31 beers on tap and daily happy hour from 3–6 PM, there’s always a reason to raise a glass. Plus, we keep the good times rolling with live music most nights of the week.
Whether you’re a regular or it’s your first time, we invite you to kick back and enjoy the Patches experience. Great food, cold drinks, and good vibes await!
Easy to see why people love Patches!
